column4: Tourism;Siem Reap: Police say an overdose of sleeping pills caused a foreigner to die in Siem Reap.------The incident was reported at Borey Angkor Hotel
column6: at 13:30 PM on 25th March 2019. The police said the victim was named ------TREVOR JOSEPH TRATTER
column8: a tourist who arrived in Cambodia on March 19
column9: 2019.------He entered through the Siem Reap International Airport via EXPEDIA Travel Company and was staying at the hotel.------Authorities concluded that the victim had taken an overdose of sleeping medication. The body was sent to Phnom Penhâ€™s Stung Meanchey pagoda waiting for the decision of the family and embassy.
